DOC.brief_summary: This open , self-paired study 200 patient heart failure diagnosis chronic stable angina pectoris , treat 30 day propatyl nitrate ( 10mg ) . Treatment regimen 3 sublingual tablet per day , 8:00 AM , 2:00 PM , 8:00 PM . The study include three visit patient study center : Pretreatment / Assessment 1 , Assessment 2 15 day treatment , Assessment 3 30 day treatment . At visit , data collect medical history , physical examination vital sign , evaluation episode angina pectoris , well laboratory evaluation adverse event use concomitant medication .
